subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Despite wanting Johan Santana, Hank Steinbrenner said he supported the direction the Yankees had taken under General Manager Brian Cashman, who has been in his job for 10 years.
snippet: Despite wanting Johan Santana, Hank Steinbrenner said he supported the direction the Yankees had taken under General Manager Brian Cashman, who has been in his job for 10 years.
